attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All cars brought into the uk should be subject to a vehicle check to ensure they are safe to be used on our roads and that the have adequate insurance cover and pay british road tax. Any car not complying after being in uk for 1 month should be clamped and fined and then destroyed if criteria not met

rejection.details: The title should be a call for action and not your name.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
